payload.description: Modify EvidenceBlockRenderer.jsx for mobile: 1) Change drag handle from p-1 (4px) to min-h-[44px] min-w-[44px] with 6-dot pattern. 2) Replace opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 action buttons with TouchActionGroup (visible on mobile, hover on desktop). 3) Replace grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 with ResponsiveGrid component. 4) Add keyboard support for Arrow key reordering.
payload.context: Line ~487: drag handle needs min-h-[44px] min-w-[44px]. Line ~513-548: action buttons need TouchActionGroup from ui/mobile/TouchActionButton. Line ~203: image grid needs ResponsiveGrid import. Add onKeyDown handler for ArrowUp/ArrowDown reordering, Delete key for deletion. Import useIsMobile from hooks/useSwipeGesture.
